uploadSection.title: Upload Draw History
uploadSection.description: Upload a CSV file with historical draws (each row = 6 numbers from 1 to 49) or JSON backup

stats.title: Statistics
stats.noData: Failed to fetch statistics. Make sure you've uploaded historical data.
stats.noHistoricalData: No historical data. Upload a CSV file with draw results in the "Dashboard" tab.
stats.totalDraws: Total number of draws in database
stats.frequencyDescription: The warmer the color, the more frequently the number appeared in draws
stats.hotNumbersDescription: These numbers appeared most frequently in historical draws
stats.coldNumbersDescription: These numbers appeared least frequently in historical draws

generate.title: Generate New Picks
generate.uniqueInfo: All generated picks are unique and do not repeat from history!

hot.label: Hot Numbers
hot.description: Prefers frequently occurring numbers from history
hot.info: Prefers numbers that frequently appeared in history

cold.label: Cold Numbers
cold.description: Prefers rarely occurring numbers from history

balanced.label: Balanced
balanced.description: Mix of frequent and rare numbers
balanced.info: Mix of 3 frequent and 3 rare numbers

combo_based.label: Combo Based
combo_based.description: Based on most frequent pairs and triples
combo_based.info: Based on most frequent pairs and triples from history

ai.label: AI
ai.info: Prediction based on machine learning and historical pattern analysis

history.title: History
history.noGeneratedPicks: No generated picks. Go to "Generate" tab to create new picks.
history.noHistoricalDraws: No historical draws. Upload a CSV file with historical results in the "Dashboard" tab.

fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select files
fileUpload.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {{maxSize}}MB
fileUpload.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Upload only CSV files.
fileUpload.uploadError: Error uploading file. Please try again.
